name: Dinner Tonight: Portobello Mushroom 'Burgers'
description: Well, I'm back at it again with a not-really-a-burger burger. Last time it was salmon and now I'm using the same word for a giant mushroom cap as a glorious, beefy patty. For a true burger lover, this is getting...
recipeIngredient: 1 ripe avocado, pitted, peeled, roughly chopped
1 beefsteak tomato, cored and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. In a roasting pan or rimmed baking sheet, toss mushrooms with oil, 1/2 cup water, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Arrange stem-side down and cover loosely with foil to allow some steam to escape. Roast for 30-45 minutes, until the mushrooms are tender.
When the mushrooms are nearly done, combine the avocado, shallot, lime juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper in a bowl. Mash thoroughly into a paste.
Toast rolls, and place mushroom on bottom half. Top with avocado mixture and tomato.
